# [Interview #1127: Figment Chat Q&A - January 19th, 2015, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1127#2)

#### Smolderwolf

Do worldhoppers in the cosmere teleport between planets, or physically travel the space between?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Both are possible.
